name: Stones of Solace
description:
Stones of Solace is a minimalistic and contemplative ritual, offering you a quiet space for relaxation.
Find out what your idol is, and take some of your time to craft them a gift.



The game offers a different shrine each day, that the player can visit whenever they feel like. Each zone brings a new atmosphere and new items to play with.
After a time of contemplation and self reflection around the stone statue, players might enjoy arranging the items in the way they like, as an offering for the statue and for themselves.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
A game by Dziff & Armel Gibson

Music by Jason Sutherland

Stones of Solace is part of the Ice Water Games label~
